name: store_memory
description: Store memories with auto-tagging and categorization. Supports 11 memory types: working-notes, decision, rule, code-snippet, learning, research, discussion, progress, task, debug, and design.

name: search_memories
description: Find specific memories by content, topic, or file using semantic or keyword search.

name: expand_memories
description: Expand memory summaries and/or document chunks to get full content with surrounding context.

name: modify_memory
description: Modify existing memories: update content/type/tags/importance, inactivate (soft delete), or reactivate memories.

name: get_insights
description: Analyze patterns, trends, and learnings across all your work. Supports comprehensive, patterns, learning, progress, quality, productivity, and technical_debt analysis types.

name: session_recap
description: Get a summary of recent activity to resume work. Shows recent memories, pending tasks, and activity summary per project.

name: get_rules
description: Get agent behavioral rules and guardrails. Returns rule-type memories from global and/or project-specific contexts.

name: projects
description: Manage project documents and relationships: create/update briefs, PRDs, implementation plans, link projects, and analyze relationships.

name: tasks
description: Manage task lifecycle: create, complete, list, or link memories to project tasks.

name: start_thinking
description: Begin a structured thinking sequence for complex problems. Creates a thinking session for step-by-step reasoning.

name: add_thought
description: Add a thought to an active thinking sequence. Builds up reasoning chain with observations, hypotheses, and conclusions.

name: recallium
description: Magic summon - load all project context in one call. Gets session recap, rules, project docs, and pending tasks.

name: help
description: Get guidance on tool selection, workflows, and best practices using progressive disclosure.

name: check_setup_status
description: Check if Recallium setup has been completed. Verifies database connection, services initialization, and MCP tools enablement.

name: intelligence_health_check
description: Check current intelligence tool usage and suggest improvements.

name: validate_intelligence_usage
description: Validate if current approach follows intelligence-first rules.
